title: MWL Import
description: Specifies import of Scheduled Procedure Step from external MWL SCP

dicomAETitle.title: Calling AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Calling AE Title used in A-ASSOCIATE-RQ to external MWL SCP

dcmMergeMWLSCP.title: Source MWL SCP
dcmMergeMWLSCP.description: AE Title of external MWL SCP to query for Scheduled Procedure Step to import.

dcmMWLWorklistLabel.title: MWL Worklist Label
dcmMWLWorklistLabel.description: Value of Worklist Label (0074,1202) of imported MWL items fetched from Source MWL SCP. If absent, imported MWL items are provided by all MWL SCP Archive Network AEs.

dcmDuration.title: Import not before
dcmDuration.description: Import Scheduled Procedure Steps from external MWL SCP to Scheduled Procedure Steps scheduled earlier in the future than the specified Time interval in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS; if absent, import all Scheduled Procedure Steps which are scheduled in the future.

dcmMWLImportNotOlder.title: Import not older than
dcmMWLImportNotOlder.description: Import Scheduled Procedure Steps from external MWL SCP to Scheduled Procedure Steps scheduled later in the past than the specified Time interval in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS; if absent, import all Scheduled Procedure Steps which are scheduled in the past.

dcmMWLImportFilterBySCU.title: Filter by SCU
dcmMWLImportFilterBySCU.description: Indicates to apply specified filter on matches returned by external MWL SCP.

dcmMWLImportDeleteNotFound.title: Delete not found
dcmMWLImportDeleteNotFound.description: Indicates to delete Scheduled Procedure Steps from local MWL not returned by external MWL SCP.

dcmIncludeField.title: Return Keys
dcmIncludeField.description: Attributes in format (all|{AttributeTagOrKeyword}|{SequenceTagOrKeyword.AttributeTagOrKeyword}) requested from the external MWL SCP additional to attributes required to be supported by MWL SCPs according DICOM. 'all' requests all attributes configured by the Patient and the MWL Attribute Filter of the Archive.
